title: How to Type a Heart Symbol in Windows

steps.title: Click on the location where you want to insert the heart.
steps.content: Click on the location where you want to insert the heart.

steps.title: Press 3 on the numeric keypad.
steps.content: Press 3 on the numeric keypad. A heart (♥) symbol will appear where you placed the cursor.

steps.title: Click on the location where you want to insert the heart.
steps.content: Click on the location where you want to insert the heart.

steps.title: Press NumLock.
steps.content: Press NumLock . It's usually in the upper-right part of the keyboard.

steps.title: Press the small 3 on the virtual keypad.
steps.content: Press the small 3 on the virtual keypad. It's usually on or near the J , K , or L keys. A heart (♥) symbol will appear where you placed the cursor. [1] X Research source Even if the keys are unlabeled, the keypad will still work when Num Lock is on. [2] X Research source
